questions.question: What exactly is Vinster?
questions.answer: Vinster is a smart digital career tool that helps you get clear about what you want, what suits you, and which direction you can go. You answer some targeted questions and then get a personal report with concrete career suggestions and next steps.

questions.question: Who is Vinster intended for?
questions.answer: For everyone who wants to make career choices that fit. High potentials, career growers, direction seekers, re-orienters, career coaches, and parents/caregivers who want to help.

questions.question: How long does the process take?
questions.answer: Most people complete everything within an hour. We do recommend taking time between steps to think carefully. Your progress is automatically saved.

questions.question: What's in the report?
questions.answer: Your report contains a summary of your preferences, a list of suitable functions (one of which is surprising), and a concrete search profile with which you can directly filter vacancies or move on to a coach or next step.

questions.question: Do I need to install anything?
questions.answer: No. Everything works online, just in your browser. You don't need to download or install anything.

questions.question: Can I stop in between and continue later?
questions.answer: Yes, your progress is automatically saved. You can pause at any time and continue later where you left off.

questions.question: What happens to my data?
questions.answer: Your data is stored securely and only used to generate your report. We don't sell anything and comply with GDPR (privacy legislation). Read more in our {{privacyverklaring}}.

questions.question: Can I also do this with my coach or parent?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Many people do this process together. The report helps to start the conversation, without having to figure it out alone.

questions.question: What does it cost?
questions.answer: One-time â‚¬29. No subscription, no fine print. You get immediate access to the complete process and your personal report.
